sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Esperanto: La milito krio por justeco estis ĉie - multe al la ĉagreno de la aŭtoritatoj.
backtrans: The war cry for justice was everywhere - much to the misfortune of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Esperanto: La decido de la reĝimo admonas la suban agendon.
backtrans: The decision of the regime requires the below agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Esperanto: La komunumo zorgis pri la forpaso de la tre bezonataj reformoj.
backtrans: The community was concerned about the death of the very required reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Esperanto: La Think-tanko publikigis paperon skizante sian pardonpeton de mortpuno.
backtrans: The Think tank released a paper outlining his apology from death penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Esperanto: Makulo restis de la valideco de la peto
backtrans: Spot remained from the validity of the request

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Esperanto: La prezidanto admonis siajn ministrojn por forigi kiel ŝlosila opozicia subteno por sia ekonomia plano estis ronde bukli.
backtrans: The president exhorted his ministers to eliminate as key competing support for his economic plan was about to bukli.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Esperanto: La balotantoj estis ŝvelintaj por vidi la fakturon.
backtrans: The voters were swollen to see the bill.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Esperanto: La diskursiva rakonto de la advokato balancis la ĵurio.
backtrans: The lawyer's discoursive story balanced the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Esperanto: La EU-bloko kontraŭis eventualan altrudon de kontraŭ-dumpingaj mezuroj.
backtrans: The EU block has opposed to a possible imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Esperanto: Fulmanulo estis liverita de la ruza konsilo.
backtrans: Lightning man was delivered by the Rush Council.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Esperanto: La gig-ekonomia agentejo decidis ornami la repagon!
backtrans: The Gig Economic Agency decided to decorate the refund!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Esperanto: Membroj de la kontraŭ-teokratia revolucia movado renversis la kunulojn en potenco!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocracy revolutionary movement overthrew the companions in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Esperanto: La perfiduloj malkontente decidis batali kun la koloniistoj.
backtrans: The traitors displeasedly decided to fight with the colonists.
